If the message exceeds the maximum size: If the message exceeds the maximum size of 50mb, then it is rejected with a 552 error code.

If the message was missing a valid \"Dat: If the message was missing a valid "Date" header, then we will add one using the arrival time from the initial connection of the message.

We only send bounces when >= 500 status: We only send bounces when >= 500 status code errors occur (when emails attempted to be forwarded have failed, e.g. Gmail responds with a 500 level error).
We only send bounces once and once only: We only send bounces once and once only (we use a calculated bounce fingerprint key and store it in cache to prevent sending duplicates).
